instruction.instruction_text: Imagine you're the TV in front of you, go stright and stop on the right hand-side of you, beside the wall.
Imagine you are the bed in front of you, and define the direction the pillow is facing as your front. Walk around the bed and stop at the left side of you.
Imagine you are the TV. head to your left hand-side and go all the way to the corridor, stop beside the dining table.
Imagine you are the chairs in front of you, enter the room, head from the right hand-side to the left hand-side of the chairs and stop at the leftmost chair.
Imagine you are a car, go from your right hand-side to your left hand-side and stop at the front left tyre of the car.
Imagine you as the beef picture in front of you, go to your left hand-side and stop in front of the oven in the kitchen.
Enter the room, imagine you as the black chair, come closer to you from your right hand-side and stop beside the table.
Imagine you're the TV, first walk straight to you, then go to your left hand-side and stop beside the sofa.
Imagine you as the TV, go to where you are heading and stop beside the right hand-side of the window, close to the pooling table.

Imagine you are a pool table. First, walk to your side closer to the door, then turn left and walk to the stairs. Turn left again to go up the stairs, walk to the top, then turn right and go down the stairs. After that, turn left and move forward until you stop in front of the door.

Imagine you're the bed, first go straight to your side, then turn right and head to the door of the room on your front right, after that turn right again and step into the storage room, then take a 90-degree left turn, walk straight and stop right in front of the clothes rack.
Imagine you are the armchair in front of you, turn left half a circle, then walk towards your right front, and then turn right to go up the stairs, and stopping at the second-floor balcony.
Imagine you are the bathtub in front of you, walking from your back of the bathroom to the door, turning left, passing through the hallway, and stopping by the bed in the bedroom.

Imagine you are the mirror in the front. Turn left and step out of the mirrors alcove, walking straight, reaching the stairs, turning left to go downstairs, and stopping in front of the coffee table in the living room.

Imagine you are the computer on the desk, jumping off the desk, turning your head and heading towards the stairs on the right front, going downstairs, and then stopping next to the coffee table in the basement.

Turn left, then go straight, then turn left again, walking down the stairs, going straight. Then imagine you are the painting on the right wall, walking from your left side to the room on the right, and stopping at the farthest part of the room where the wine is displayed.

Imagine you are the only window in this room, turn head and walk towards the corridor ahead of you. Jumping out of the window frame, walking out of the room, crossing the corridor, turning right. Then imagine you are the painting on the right wall, going upstairs from your right side, then walking straight into the bathroom in front of you, and stopping in front of the toilet.

Turn half a circle clockwise, then imagine you are the painting on the right wall. Walk from your left side to the right side, moving forward through the hallway, passing through the living room, going out the door at the other end of the hallway, entering the small yard, and stopping at the corner to the left front.

Roll out of the gym, crossing the small yard, entering the main building. Then, imagine you are the painting on the right wall, moving from your left side to your right side and finally stopping at the bottom of the stairs on the first floor.

Turn your head clockwise to face the corridor, walk straight out of the current room and through the corridor. Then imagine you are the air conditioner hanging on the wall ahead. Gradually approach yourself, then turn left and walk towards your right side, stopping in front of the table at your lower right.
Jump off the sofa, crossing the hallway. Imagine you are the bed in the room ahead, and define the direction the pillow faces as the front. Walk from your right front to your exact front and stop.
Imagine you are the painting above the bed. From your current position, turn left and walk forward until you reach your right front, then turn right, moving to your right side.
Imagine you are the mirror, moving into the bathroom on your left side. Finally, turn left to face the wall and stop.
Imagine you are the wall in front of you, then walk into the room on your right, stopping in front of the window.

Imagine you are the window on the wall ahead, turning right and walking straight to exit the main door, entering into the courtyard on your left front. Then turn left to stop in front of the storage room door.

Imagine you are the door on the left front, with the side facing the hallway being your front. Take two steps along the wall, and walk from your right side to the bedroom on the left, crossing the hallway into the room, and stopping in front of the bedside table.
First, turn left and face the bed. Then, imagine you are the painting on the wall. Keep moving forward towards yourself, until you reach the corner where the bed and the wall meet, and then stop.
First, turn left about half a circle. Then, imagine you are the TV, walk towards the right front, and stop in front of the cabinet on your left.

First, turn left about half a circle. Then, imagine you are the painting at the very front, walking along the hallway, turning right to go upstairs, and stopping at the point where the stairs on the second floor no longer move.

Turn right to exit the room, going downstairs. Then imagine you are the door in front, turning left, walk towards the bathroom on your right. And finally stop at the entrance of the bathroom on the right side of the corridor.
Imagine you are the words on the wall, moving to the right side of the painting.
Imagine you are the paintings, go straight to your left hand-side and enter the bathroom in the hallway.
Imagine you are the wooden cupboard, go to your right hand-side and stop in front of the TV.
Enter the room next to the toilet, go straight into the room and imagine you as the fan, stop stright behind you.
Imagine you are the painting on the wall, go to your left hand-side and stop beside the wall.
Imagine you are the black painting on the wall, go to your right hand-side and head downstairs, stop in front of the washing machine.
Imagine you are the potted plant on the cabinet, go to your right hand-side and enter the room, stop right in front of the window.
Imagine you are the painting of a deer on the wall, go to your left hand-side and stop at the end of the stairs.
Imagine you are the fire stove, head to your left hand-side and stop right in front of the paintings on the wall, beside the window.
Imagine you are the water sink in the kitchen, walk from your right side to the left side, and stop in front of the stove.
Imagine you are the firestove, go to your right hand-side and head straight to the bathroom on the first floor, stop beside the white door.
Imagine you are the painting on the wall, moving to your left side and stop.
Imagine you are the door in front of you, go to the position where you can go outside from the door and stop beside the water sink.
Imagine you are the white cupboard, go to your left hand-side and stop beside the flowers.
Imagine you are the white armchair, go to where you are heading, go up the stairs to the second floor, and stop at the top of the stairs to wait for me.
Imagine you are the sofa in the corridor, head from your right side to the left side and go all the way to the centre of the bathroom.
Imagine you as the painting on the wall, go straight to your heading orientation, go down the stairs and stop among three sofas.
Imagine you are the bed on the floor, go to your left hand-side and stop.

Imagine you are the chair at the door, go to your right hand-side, walk through the hallway, turning right, passing the staircase, turning right again, and stopping next to the office chair in the studio.
Imagine you are the mop, go to your left hand-side, turn right and walk out of the room. After entering the room on the left side, stop in front of a chair on your right.
Imagine you as the white sofa in the bedroom, go to where you are heading, exit the room, go through the corridor, and stop at the top of the stairs on the second floor.
Imagine you are the tripod on the first floor, going upstairs, turning left, entering the bathroom, and stopping next to the bathtub.
Imagine you are the window on the roof, moving to the black leather jacket on your right side.
Imagine you are the painting in front of you, go to where you are heading, walk out of the bedroom, crossing to the opposite bedroom, turning right, and stopping in front of the mirror.
Imagine you are the wooden shelf, go to your right hand-side and stop in the middle of the toilet in the bedroom's bathroom.
Imagine you are the mirror in front of you, walking to the mirror on your left side.
Imagine you are the TV, walking to the laundry room on your right hand-side, and stopping in front of the first washing machine.
Imagine you are the refrigerator, walking to your right hand-side and stop beisde the chair behind the dining table closest to you.
Go upstairs, and go to the rightmost bedroom, imagine you as the mirror in the bedroom, stop just in front of you.
Imagine you as the bed, go to your right hand-side and stop.
Go to the reddish style room, imagine you as the fan, go just behind you and stop.
Please imagine yourself as the firestove in the living room, walk to your right hand-side, reach the end of the hallway, stop by the desk lamp and wait for me.
Please imagine yourself as the painting, walk from your right hand-side to your left hand-side, reach the end of the hallway, and stop between the waste paper and the cloth.
Please imagine yourself as the painting in front of you, walk to your right hand-side, follow the hallway to the end, and stop in front of the washing machine.

Head into the hallway, imagine you are the cupboard with a lamp on it, go past the right side of you, then stop at the front-right of the yellow chair and to the left of the bookshelf, and wait for me.
Imagine you are a TV, enter the hallway from your left, walk to the end, enter the bathroom next to the black and white painting, and stop in the middle of the bathroom.

Imagine you are the black and white chair, move forward to your right hand-side and enter the hallway, stop between the nine grid bookshelf and the white door, located directly in front of the white door.
Imagine you are the TV, go from the right side of you, past it to the left, then through the long bookshelf, and stop at the end of the hallway, two meters in front and to the right of the toilet.
Leave this room, go down the hall into the kitchen, and imagine yourself as the fridge, stop about two meters in front of you, to your left. Wait for me.
Imagine you are the TV, go along the front of you until you're between the pool table and the bookshelf, right in front and to the right of the pool table.
Imagine yourself as the yellow sofa, please head to the right of you, go through the hallway, and in the kitchen, stop between the fridge and the sink.
Go up the stairs, head into the living room. Imagine yourself as the table lamp and stop to the front-left of you, right next to the TV.
Please go downstairs and imagine yourself as the computer screens, go over to the front of you, right next to the clutter by the storage cabinet.
Please go downstairs, imagine you are the picture frame that are just downstairs, walk towards the right side of you, through the kitchen, and stop at the front-left of the stove to wait for me.
Go upstairs, past the bookshelf and the couch. Imagine yourself as the living room couch and stop to the right side of you, near the front door.
Go downstairs, imagine you're the grey door, head to your left, and stop under the fan.
Imagine you are the mirror, walk to the right side of you, go through the hallway, and stop to the left and in front of the bathroom mirror, right next to the shower.
Go straight from the right of the chair, through the hallway. Imagine yourself as the wooden cabinet, past it on its right, and stop in front of the black sofa.
Imagine you are the mirror. Walk to your right, follow the corridor, and stop at the sink.
Go past the wooden cabinet on your right and into the hallway, walk to the end, and imagine yourself as the table, stop just to the front-right of you, right up against the bed.
Imagine you're the black cabinet, go into the hallway from your right side, and stop two meters to the left and in front of the toilet.
Imagine you are the fridge in the living room, walk past the left side of you, into the porch, and stop between the eight-person table and the table lamp, facing the cabinet.
Imagine you're the fireplace, go past your right, into the hallway, and stop between the painting and the ladder in the living room.
Imagine you're the TV. Start moving forward from your right side, go to the center of the room at the end of the hallway, and stop.
Imagine you are the clock, please walk in the direction you are facing, go downstairs, pass the potted plant, and stop between the fireplace and the yellow couch.
Walk straight past the sofa, imagine you are the TV, take the hallway to the right of you, and stop at the end by the three black and white pictures.
Go upstairs, imagine you are the bed in the living room, past the TV and fireplace, into the room at the end of the hall, and stop to the right of you, with the blue pillows.
Leave this room, go into the living room, walk past the potted plant, stop at the laundry room door, and then imagine yourself as a washing machine with the door at your front left.
Imagine you are the frame in front of you, moving to your left and stopping at the end window
Walk straight to the mirror, go down the stairs. Imagine you are the picture frame, walk to the right of you, and stop at the front door.
Leave the current room, go through the kitchen. Imagine you are the microwave, walk from the right side of you, enter the kitchen, and stop two meters to the front-right of the clock.
Imagine you're the painting. Go to the left side of the painting and walk to the end of the corridor, then stop just to the left of the window and wait for me.
Imagine you are the fridge, please go downstairs and stop at the front right of you, near the window.
Imagine you are the spoon, walk past the room to your left side, go through the hallway, and stop by the white main gate.

Imagine you are the piano, walk from the right side of you to the left, then go up the stairs, following the handrail until you're in the room, and stop at the left side of the single bed, facing the teddy bear.
Imagine you are the cabinet, go past the left side of you, then through the hallway, along the left side of the mirror, and stop at the front-right of the toilet in the bathroom.
Imagine you are the piano, head to the right side of you, go all the way down the corridor, and stop by the sink and window.
Leave the room, go down the stairs, imagine you are the sign at the end of the stairs, walk towards your right end, and stop between the computer and the TV.
Imagine you are the TV, walk to the left side of the TV and stop by the window.
Imagine you are the hallway entrance, walk inside you, then turn left into the living room, and stop between the two TVs and the brown sofa in the living room.
Imagine you are the fridge, walk to the left front of you, then go into the hallway and stop right in front of the glass, right next to the bathtub.
Imagine you are the white cabinet, go between you and the bed in the other bedroom.
Imagine you're the purple sofa facing the fireplace; move to your right, go down the hall, and wait by the front door.
Imagine you're the staircase, facing upstairs, take the corridor on your left and wait by the toaster at the very end.
Imagine you are the fireplace, please go to the right side of you, and stop one meter in front and to its right.
Imagine you're a table. Go straight from your front-left corner towards the door, then through the hallway, and stop in front of the microwave.
Imagine you're a TV. Go into the room on your right and position yourself against the wall.
Imagine you're a refrigerator, go out the door to your front left, get into the living room, and stop between the TV and the sofa, closer to the sofa.
Imagine you're a black cabinet. Go straight, keeping to your right, until you reach the bedroom curtains, then stop and wait for me.
Imagine being the hardwood hallway, go down its middle, into the living room, and wait for me by the floor-to-ceiling window near the TV.
Imagine you're the living room sofa. Walk straight back until you're against the wall.
Imagine you're a white square table, move forward and to your right until you get to the black-framed painting on the wall.
Imagine you're an oven, stand 2 meters to your front right, and wait for me.
Imagine you're a globe, waiting for me about 1.5 meters to your front-left.
Imagine you're the floor lamp. Go around what's in front of you, get to three meters in front of the cabinet in the living room, and wait for me.
Imagine you are the bed, please head from the front right of you, go downstairs, and wait for me by the vase at the foot of the stairs.
Imagine you're a sofa, and the path goes from your back, around the corridor, and stops at a surfboard outside the door.
Please go upstairs, imagine you're the bed in the bedroom, pass behind yourself, and stop at the glass cabinet.
Please imagine you're an outdoor square table. Circle your spot and stop next to the white table lamp.
Imagine you're a TV, sitting 1.25 meters ahead and 30 degrees to your left.
Imagine you're a refrigerator, move 2.25 meters to your front left and stop.
Imagine you are the painting, please walk to the right of you, then follow the corridor to the very end and stop at the lobby door.
Imagine you're a TV, coming in from the right, through the doorway, and straight into the inner bedroom, stopping by the bed with the tree pattern.
Imagine you are the fireplace, go wait for me about 2.5 meters to the front right of you.
Imagine you are the yellow table, walk past you, head upstairs, and wait for me right in front of the washing machine.
Imagine you're a bookshelf, and walk straight ahead to the blinds in the bedroom across from you.
Imagine you're a wooden table, go to the opposite corner and wait for me.
Imagine you are a six-person long table, walk all the way to the far corner, and wait for me right under the blinds.
Imagine you're two black chairs. Pass behind yourself, stop by the kitchen sink, and wait for me.
Imagine you're a porcelain vase, facing the living room. Enter the bedroom from your right and stop by the bathtub.
Go straight first, then turn right. Imagine you're a grey chair, then walk straight ahead, out the main door, go another several steps and stop.
Imagine you are the wall in the bedroom, walk in a U-shape and stop against you in the empty bedroom, about 3 meters from the window.
Imagine you're the grey cabinet and go along its left side all the way to the end of the room.
Imagine you're a sofa facing the firing place. Now, go to the backside of you until you're against the wall.
Leave this room, go down the hall to the washing machine at the end, imagine you're the washing machine, and just stop right there.
Imagine you are the piano, go through the doorway to the left of you, walk straight and stop to the left of the gray sofa, facing the vase mural.
Imagine you are the fridge, walk past you on the right, and stop right in front of the furthest couch.
Imagine you're the table in front of me, and you're moving diagonally to the far end of the room.
Imagine you're the fridge. Go past on your right, then go around the sofa, and wait for me in front of the TV.
Imagine you're the brown couch you see, going straight back until you hit the end.
Imagine you're the black chair. Walk to your right, take the first left down the corridor, and stop at the very end.
Imagine yourself as a black chair, then move left until you hit the far end of the bedroom and stop.
Imagine you're a brown chair. Walk backward to the very end, then stop by the bed in the bedroom.
Imagine you're a brown chair. Go straight ahead, head up the stairs, and stop in the conference room by the wall and table.
Imagine you're a black couch, come down the stairs behind you, and wait for me by the sink at the end of the hall.
Imagine you're a brown chair, go past your front right, and wait for me by the oven.
Imagine yourself as a billboard, then walk past its right side and continue straight until the wooden floor ends.
Imagine you're a potted plant, do a slow counter-clockwise spin, then head upstairs to the TV and wait for me.
Imagine you're a billboard. Go around your front left and stop about a meter in front and to the right of the black sofa behind you.
Imagine you are a faucet, follow your direction straight to where the inside meets the outside, and wait for me there.
Imagine you are the mirror in the room, please go left of you, all the way to the end of the hall.
Imagine yourself as a mirror facing the living room. Step out of the corridor to your right and stops between two chairs.
Imagine you are the sofa in the living room, please go to the far left end of you, from its front, by the wall, and wait for me.
Imagine you are the oven in the kitchen, go left from you, all the way to the window, I want to enjoy the great view.
Imagine you are the sofa in the living room, stop at the right side of you facing the TV.
With the bookshelf as the center, imagine yourself as the bookshelf, please move towards the right side of you and stop at the right side of the bed.
Imagine you are the bookshelf, please leave the bedroom, then head left from you and stop at the dark blue pillow in the other bedroom.
Please head downstairs and imagine you are the blue chair, stand about 1.5 meters back and to the right of you in the study.
Imagine you are the album, head left from you, through the archway, and stop in front and to the right of the TV.
Imagine you are the sofa, could you go to the right of you, about 4 meters out, and wait for me?
Imagine yourself as the shampoo cabinet, go right behind you, take a left, then head into the bedroom and stop at the TV, to its left.
Imagine you are the grey stool, go downstairs, then head towards the front right of you, and stop in front of another grey stool to wait for me.
Imagine you are the L-shaped table in your view, walk along you, go past the fridge on your right, and stop at the stair entrance.
Imagine you are the sink in the restroom, please wait for me behind you, on the other side of the table by the window.
Imagine you are the mirror in the bedroom, please go to the bedroom and wait for me in front of the blinds to the right of you.
Imagine you are the microwave in the kitchen, please go to the kitchen and wait for me two meters to the front left of you.
Imagine you are the blue sofa, please stop under the stairs, at the front right of you.
Imagine you are the wooden bench, please go downstairs and stop directly in front of you, the grey sofa, and the TV.
Imagine you are the black chair, please pass by from the left side of you, bypass the black sofa in the living room, and wait for me on the side of the wooden table away from the window.
Imagine you are the black chair, please pass by the right side of you, enter the hallway, walk into the bathroom, and wait for me next to the black wall and bathtub.
Imagine you are the black cabinet, please enter the corridor from the right side of you, walk along the corridor to the end, and stop at the restroom.
Please imagine you're the sink, then from your right, head into the large bedroom and wait for me between the L-shaped corner near the window.
Please imagine yourself as the black sofa in the living room, heading behind you and stopping at a distance of 4m from you.
Imagine you are the sink, please start from the left of you, make your way to the left of the painting on the wall, then enter the bedroom and stop right in front of the black chair.
Imagine you are the sofa in the living room, go past you on the right, walk all the way to the end of the hallway, and wait for me under the middle of the three paintings on the wall.
Imagine you are the towel in the bathroom, please walk past you on the right, exit the bathroom, and stop in front of the living room TV to wait for me.
Imagine you are the red sofa in the living room, walk between the two sofas, passing you on your left, then enter the first bedroom on the right and stop by the blinds.
Imagine you are the refrigerator in the living room, leave the bedroom, walk through the corridor past you from the right to your left, until you reach the end.
Imagine you are the two sofas in the basement, go downstairs into the basement with you, and stop three meters directly in front of the American flag, right next to the wooden table.
imagine you are the small stool, exit the bedroom to the left of you, go through the hallway, into the storage room, and stop two meters directly in front of the wreath.
Imagine you are the pentagram, leave the room from the left side of you, go to the room opposite you, and stop next to the shower curtain.
Imagine you are the bar in the room, go around you, stop right in front of the oven and wait for me.
Imagine you are the lamp, go right past you into the hallway, then into the bathroom, and wait for me at the very back.
Imagine you are the elk painting, please go down the hallway to the left of you, all the way to the end, and stop by the window.
Imagine you are the fridge, head into the hallway to the left of you, go through it, and stop by the two spotted chairs in the living room.
Imagine you are the deer painting, enter the hallway on the right side of the orientation that you are facing, and stop by the oven to wait for me.
Imagine you are the TV, go from the left side of the cabinet, into the hallway, stop right in front and to the right of you, and stand on the red rug waiting for me.
Imagine you are the TV, enter the hallway from right to left in front of you, turn right at the first entrance, and wait for me in front of the mirror.
Imagine you are the painting, go in the direction you are facing, walk out of the house, turn right, and stop next to the potted plant.
Imagine you are the boiler, walk past the stove and stop at the front right of you, by the window.
Imagine you are the chair, go to the back right of you, then go straight until you reach the brown towel and stop.
Imagine you are the sofa, go to the left of the lamp, go into the living room, and stop behind you that's perpendicular to the bookshelf.
Imagine you are the locker, walk to the right of you, then go straight and stop under the painting, by the porcelain.
Imagine you are the white lamp, please go past you on your left, then the grandfather clock, and stop by the bookshelf on the second floor.
Imagine you are the lounge chair, follow the handrail to the end, enter the bedroom, and stop 1.25 meters to the front left of you in the bedroom and wait for me.
Imagine you are the mirror, go past your front left, through the bookshelf's front right, and then stop by the computer desk.
Imagine you are the mirror, go into the bathroom across from your room and stand about a meter to the front-left of you and wait for me.
Go down the stairs, walk into the living room, imagine you are the two white sofas, and stop right in front of you and wait for me.
Imagine you are the bookshelf, go upstairs, go to the front-left of you in the back bedroom, and wait for me.
Imagine you're the African elephant photo on the wall. Head right of the picture, go straight to the kitchen, and stop by the sink.
Imagine yourself as a television, move forward from the left side of you, and stop at the far side of the bathtub away from the blinds.
Imagine you are the gray sofa, go to the right of you, enter the hallway, and stop in the bedroom with the crib, to the left of the stroller.
Go past the pink piano on the right, enter the next bedroom, imagine you are the blue bed, and wait for me immediately to the left of you.
Imagine you are the gray chair, go downstairs from the right side of you, and wait for me three meters directly in front of the living room fireplace.
Imagine you're a TV. Move forward from your front-left until you're directly in front of the yoga mat and stop.
Imagine yourself as a mirror, move forward from your right side, walk in a U-shape, and stop next to the range hood and sink.
Imagine yourself as a mirror, move forward from your left side, enter the room on your right at the end of the hallway, and stop next to the shower.
